New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most three-pointers in a debut with 6
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic had 28 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists despite a rusty performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dereck Lively II had a career-high 15 points, 11 rebounds, and 6 assists
Others: The Mavericks used a flurry of three-pointers in the second half to control the game
